Body:
t = Template(
    """
        <%!
            def a(text):
                return "this is a " + text.strip()
        %>
        ${foo()}
        ${foo()}
        <%def name="foo()" cached="True" buffered="True">
            this is a test
        </%def>
        """
    , buffer_filters=['a'])
self._install_mock_cache(t)
eq_(result_lines(t.render()), ['this is a this is a test',
    'this is a this is a test'])
